isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 1.7: VEHICLE FEATURES - HYDRAULIC PRESSURE GOVERNOR

svcproc.title: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE GOVERNOR
svcproc.para: This optional feature can be used on special trucks (fire trucks) equipped with hydraulic pumps which output pressure is controlled by adjusting engine RPM.
Body builder connections are provided and the ECM can be programmed for this purpose on request.

This feature can be programmed to fit the operator needs. Engine RPM ramp rate and hydraulic pressure governor gain adjustments are among the available variables that allow this feature to be such a versatile tool.
